title: Jinx OP
body: I played jinx and i get 4 pentakills in a day in patch 7.13 i am not even good at jinx or adc role  and now in patch 7.14 a jinx just got a penta on my team and her damage does seem OP even if she is not fed,someone think  that she is to powerful too?

replies.body: She's not OP, but she's a hipercarry that snowballs pretty hard. All she needs is to proc her passive once to completely dominate a teamfight, so long as she's properly guarded;positioned.
The only thing op here is your match history showing you havent gotten a single penta recently
